trends: There have been 2 other sightings in North Manchester
There were no other sightings in North Manchester on or around September 19th 2010
divs: sighting detailsstepped out of my house to have my nightly look at the stars. i was facing to the east from north manchester. i noticed a bright star or some planets bundled together( i think it may have been uranus and jupiter) to the south east. it was left of the moon. while watching that bright star. a light came on to the left of the star\planets. it came on for about 4 seconds and was orange and then faded off. it reminded me of the older car lights..orange colored and slowly fade off. i know it wasnt a plane because it never moved.(yes i know sometimes they turn there landing lights on for a bit and if they are headed straight at you ..it may look like its staying in place)after the light faded out there was a black spot in its place. i could see a round black spot because the moon was so bright and i saw it with my binoculars. the black spot stayed in position for a half an hour. i looked down for a second and looked back up and it was gone. i missed seeing the orange light with the binoculars.. when i went to reach for them the light went out.
Summary: Orange Ball of Light Fading away
